text: Todd Lamb (born October 19, 1971) is an American politician who served as the 16th lieutenant governor of Oklahoma from 2011 to 2019. He is a Republican. He was a member of the Oklahoma Senate from 2004 to 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== * Office of the Lieutenant Governor Website * Todd Lamb for Lt. Governor * Oklahoma State Election Board, 2004 * Category:1971 births Category:Lieutenant Governors of Oklahoma Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Oklahoma Category:People from Enid, Oklahoma Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Todd Lamb (politician)
